oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Canadian Copper Mining Data - D Young Thesis
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Young, Denise
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mine-level copper data (1953-1984) used in Young, D. (1992), "Cost Specification and Firm Behaviour in a Hotelling Model of Resource Extraction," Canadian Journal of Economics XXV, 41-59. Spreadsheet has 5 tabs (including data and explanatory materials).
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Canadian mine-level copper production
copper prices
oai_dc:dc.dc:type: Firm-level production and cost level and provincial / national price data
